__documentation.summary: Opens the nodes browser in which the user can select a node.

params.name: documentId
description: (Optional) Can be used to open the nodes browser with a node preselected.
Should only be used in combination with nodeId

params.name: labelQuery
description: (Optional) The label for each node will be determined by the labelQuery.
If the labelQuery is not specified, the label will be the text content of the node.
Example: If you want the title of a node to be the label,
the labelQuery could be `if(./title) then(./title) else(.)`.

params.name: linkableElementsQuery
description: (Optional) The nodes that the user can choose from are specified by the linkableElementsQuery.
The default of the linkableElementsQuery is `//*[@id]` which means all nodes with an @id attribute.
Example: If you only want footnodes in your nodes list, the linkableElementsQuery could be `//fn`.

params.name: modalPrimaryButtonLabel
description: (Optional) The label for the button in the bottom right corner, when clicking this button
the selected node will be submitted. The default value for this label is 't__Insert'.

params.name: modalTitle
description: (Optional) Specifies the title of the modal which is shown in the upper left corner.
The default value for this title is 't__Select an element'.

params.name: nodeId
description: (Optional) Can be used to open the nodes browser with a node preselected.
Should only be used in combination with documentId

returns.name: documentId
returns.description: The documentId of the document where the selected node is in.

returns.name: nodeId
returns.description: The nodeId of the selected node.
